articles.title: Iran want FIFA to ban USA for 10 games for showing flag without Islamic republic emblem - The Indian Express
articles.description: A now-deleted graphic of the Group B standings posted on Saturday across U.S. Soccer’s official Twitter, Instagram and Facebook accounts displayed the Iranian flag only bearing its green, white and red colours.
articles.content: Responding to the United States temporarily displaying Irans national flag on social media without the emblem of the Islamic Republic as a show of solidarity with protesters in Iran, the Iranian Foot… [+1307 chars]

articles.title: "Fake...Photoshopped": Jay Shah, BCCI face ridicule for tweet on Guinness World Record claim - Janta Ka Reporter
articles.description: BCCI Secretary Jay Shah has once again found himself at the receiving end as netizens ridiculed him for his Guinness World Record claim in connection with an IPL match. Many people alleged the photo of Shah used in the official tweet was fake and photoshopped.

articles.title: 'Have the brains and common sense to...': Brett Lee's advice to Arshdeep Singh - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former Australia fast bowler and one of the mightiest pacers of the world, Brett Lee has a few crucial advices for Arshdeep to help him get better and prevent him from falling off the tracks. | Cricket
articles.content: Fast bowler Arshdeep Singh has been one of India's breakout stars of 2022. The young left-arm quick has quickly cemented his place in India's T20I set-up and is on his way of doing the same in ODIs. … [+4703 chars]
